dcterms:creator: Baotian Hu
Qingcai Chen
Fangze Zhu
dcterms:description: Large Scale Chinese Social Media Text Summarization Dataset (LCSTS) consists of more than 2,400,000 text-summary pairs, constructed from a famous Chinese social media website called Sina Weibo. It is split into three parts, with PART I used as the training set, PART II as the validation set, and PART III as the test set.
dcterms:title: Large Scale Chinese Social Media Text Summarization Dataset (LCSTS)

dcterms:creator: Julian John McAuley
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: The Amazon Fine Foods Reviews Corpus contains usersâ€™ rating labels as well as the summary for the reviews, making it possible to train a classifier to predict sentiment labels and a seq2seq model to generate summaries.
dcterms:title: Amazon Fine Foods Reviews Corpus
